data.text: @BEHMHTNHS @JackieSmith_nmc @kandola8 @CareQualityComm Great news congrats to all your staff @ClareSc78348774

@BEHMHTNHS @JackieSmith_nmc @kandola8 @CareQualityComm Thank you and congratulations to every single person who has contributed to this result.  Evidence of a huge amount of dedication, perseverance and compassion amongst our staff, patients & community partners. 

We are so good when we work together #TeamBEH. 🙏🙏🙏
@BEHMHTNHS @JackieSmith_nmc @CareQualityComm Really proud of TeamBEH, & all the improvements made by the team.  Well done 👏 👏👏

The CQC highlighted: effective leadership, improvements to our buildings, involving patients in planning their care, responsive management of the impact of the pandemic, and a strong focus on quality of services. @kandola8 @JackieSmith_nmc #TeamBEH is GOOD!

We’re delighted that our Enfield community health services were rated ‘Good’ in all categories. The CQC also found improvements in our adult acute wards, psychiatric intensive care units, and adult community mental health services. #TeamBEH is GOOD!

The CQC rated us rated ‘Good’ overall and ‘Good’ for being effective, caring, responsive and well-led. We’re building on what’s already working well and addressing the areas where we need to improve: https://t.co/gPxmYPVBi4 #TeamBEH is GOOD!

We have built on our existing CQC ‘Good’ rating despite the very tough challenges of the COVID-19 pandemic. @kandola8 and @JackieSmith_nmc pay tribute to our dedicated compassionate staff – watch our film including staff from across BEH: https://t.co/B8RkIAdeDY #TeamBEH is GOOD!
